name: Practiced Perfection

desc.0: The stars fell into the web of absolute order, just as it had years ago, reflected in the girl's clear gaze. Confidence, grace, resolve, courage, and love — now shaped into a sword of pride, held firmly in her grasp.
desc.2: "I want to 3D print a model that's perfectly symmetrical from every angle. I just need to input the command, right?" —Alice, one minute before her W-Engine started billowing black smoke and shut down.

desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: Starlight became her blade, and she held courage and love firmly in her hands.
phaseDescs: The equipper's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly Mastery</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>60</ct>. When inflicting <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct>, the equipper's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> for 20s, stacking up to 2 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When the equipper enters combat, immediately gain 2 stacks.

The equipper's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly Mastery</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>69</ct>. When inflicting <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct>, the equipper's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>23%</ct> for 20s, stacking up to 2 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When the equipper enters combat, immediately gain 2 stacks.

The equipper's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly Mastery</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>78</ct>. When inflicting <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct>, the equipper's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>26%</ct> for 20s, stacking up to 2 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When the equipper enters combat, immediately gain 2 stacks.

The equipper's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly Mastery</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>87</ct>. When inflicting <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct>, the equipper's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>29%</ct> for 20s, stacking up to 2 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When the equipper enters combat, immediately gain 2 stacks.

The equipper's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly Mastery</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>96</ct>. When inflicting <ct color=#F0D12B>Assault</ct>, the equipper's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>32%</ct> for 20s, stacking up to 2 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When the equipper enters combat, immediately gain 2 stacks.
